title: When you accidentally flash, and you know everyone saw it

replies.body:
When it's still 00:10, and everyone else on your team immediately flashes afterwards.

https://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/55085991.jpg

If we are to fail, let us fail as friends.
http://www.self.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/tumblr_mhx6wtGHLe1qigluvo1_500.gif

Ha. Had this happen once in an ARAM. Our entire team proceeded to flash after the accidental flash. And then the enemy team did it, too.

Good times.

At least you aren't SKT Faker failing an essential flash at world's for everyone to see.

Makes me glad I'm just an unranked toplaner.
I flashed towards someone at the same time they flashed towards me once. We both flew past eachother and fired skillshots that missed. That was awkward.

Keep it positive.

You dodged his dodge.
